Headline: #95 95th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 95th/Stony Island-Woodlawn
ShortDescription: WB 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Stony Island, 87th, Cottage Grove, and 95th due to, street blockage near 95th/Stony Island-Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Stony Island, 87th, Cottage Grove, and 95th due to, street blockage near 95th/Stony Island-Woodlawn.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
